addGasToken(address,uint256,uint256).details: A function that allows us to enable gas tokens for use with this contract.

burnDiscountedMinting(address,uint256).details: A function that allows a user to burn some GSVE to avoid paying the protocol mint/wrap fee.

calculateStakeReward(address).details: A function that allows us to calculate the total rewards a user has not claimed yet.

claimToken(address,uint256).details: A function that allows a user to claim tokens from the pool The user burns 1 GSVE for each token they take. They are limited to one claim action every 6 hours, and can claim up to 5 tokens per claim.

claimable(address).details: A function that allows us to easily check claim type of the token.

collectReward().details: A function that allows a user to collect the stake reward entitled to them in the situation where the rewards pool does not have enough tokens then the user is given as much as they can be given.

constructor.details: the constructor allows us to set the gsve token as the token we are using for staking and other protocol features also lets us set the vault address.

discountedMinting(address,uint256).details: A function that allows a user to benefit from a lower protocol fee, based on the stake that they have.

mintingType(address).details: A function that allows us to check the mint type of the token.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

rewardedMinting(address,uint256).details: A function that allows a user to be rewarded tokens by minting or wrapping they pay full fees for this operation.

stake(uint256).details: A function that allows a user to stake tokens.  If they have a rewards from a stake already, they must claim this first.

totalRewardUser(address).details: A function that allows us to see how much rewards a user has claimed

totalRewards().details: A function that allows us to see how much rewards the vault has available right now.

totalStaked().details: A function that allows us to see the total stake of everyone in the protocol.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

transferOwnershipOfSubcontract(address,a.details: A function that allows us to reassign ownership of the contracts that this contract owns.  /* Enabling future smartcontract upgrades without the complexity of proxy/proxy upgrades.

unstake().details: A function that allows a user to fully unstake.

userStakeSize(address).details: A function that allows us to see the stake size of a specific staker.
